amendment.description: To prohibit Urban Area Security Initiative grant recipients from funding projects that do not improve homeland security.
amendment.purpose: To prohibit Urban Area Security Initiative grant recipients from funding projects that do not improve homeland security.

action.text: Amendment SA 69 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 26.
Amendment SA 69, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 39.
